thread.title: Chris Evans, ‘Gifted’ crew continue filming on Tybee Island
thread.title_full: Chris Evans, ‘Gifted’ crew continue filming on Tybee Island | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Chris Evans, ‘Gifted’ crew continue filming on Tybee Island
text:
Photos Chris Evans with his young co-star walks the beach on Tybee Island for a scene in the upcoming movie 'Gifted.' Photo by @AtlantaFilming Related Stories Chris Evans, Octavia Spencer begin filming 'Gifted' on Tybee Island Captain America & an Oscar winner coming to Savannah, need your help Related Links SLIDESHOW: Movies Made in Savannah By Savannah Morning News Chris Evans, best known for his role as Captain America, was on Tybee Island’s beaches this weekend filming the upcoming movie “Gifted.”
The majority of the movie is being filmed on Tybee Island, which is representing rural, coastal Florida in the film.
The movie stars Evans, along with Oscar winner Octavia Spencer. Evans plays Frank Alder, an underachiever who is raising his niece, Mary, after her mother, his sister dies, according to an article on Deadline.com . Mary is deemed gifted but her uncle wants her to have a normal childhood. The drama follows the relationship as Evans’ character sues for custody of his gifted niece.
The movie has filmed on Tybee Island since Oct. 7 and filming is expected to continue throughout the month. The production crew used a house on Butler Avenue between Lovell Avenue for several days to film scenes. Local restaurants and businesses also are set to make appearances in the movie.
